name: Zero Uravity - Hoverboard Racing
description:
In the year 2222, an escaped tiger mutant must play extreme hover board sports to entertain her fans across the metaverse and win her freedom in the neo-feudal society of Neon City, lorded over by the Bitcoin Barons.  In this heart pounding extreme sports racing game, choose between two different levels and dive headlong into hover car traffic.

Do sweet tricks, go fast and don't stop!

Recommended used with controller if available. 

PC:

Move = WASD

Grind = Left Shift 

Jump = Space 

Pad:

Move = Left Stick 

Throttle & Break = Triggers 

Grind = Left bumper 

Jump = A 

Background Assets (Buildings & Cars) from https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/environments/sci-fi/polygon-sci-fi-spac...

All other 3D models made by Kitaro
